mean_en: to refuse or fail to answer questions, to do what has been requested, etc., especially in order to delay or prevent something
sentence: She'll never agree - she always stonewalls me whenever I ask her.
sentence_trans: 她不会同意的，因为每次她都毅然决然地拒绝我。
word_etyma: stone石头 ＋ wall墙壁 → 石头墙壁 → stonewall妨碍
